doc.title: Soothsayer
doc.plot: Adapted from Hugo and Nebula Award-winning author Mike Resnick's first installment in the ORACLE Trilogy, The Oracle: Soothsayer, is the story of PENELOPE BAILEY, a young girl with the power to change the future. Her powers are the envy of the known universe and a bounty has been placed on her head by six separate governments, including the most powerful of them all - The Democracy. It's up to two bounty hunters and a thief to save her but maybe saving her is the worst thing they can do...
